bibl.title: Coptic and Byzantine Textiles Found in Egypt: Corpora, Collections, and Scholarly Perspectives.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Earliest discoveries, collections, and catalogues. - Changing perspectives on Coptic, Byzantine, and Persian textile traditions. - Evidence for the variety, production, and circulation of textiles in Egypt and beyond.
THOMAS Thelma K., Coptic and Byzantine Textiles Found in Egypt: Corpora, Collections, and Scholarly Perspectives.
Roger S. BAGNALL (Ed.), Egypt in the Byzantine World, 300-700 (Cambridge, 2007) pp. 137-162, 13 figg.
